children.docstring: The recommended way to install the google auth library is through [Composer](http://getcomposer.org).
children.name: Installing via Composer

symbols.docstring: This is Google's officially supported PHP client library for using OAuth 2.0 authorization and authentication with Google APIs.
symbols.name: Description

children.name: Set up ADC

symbols.docstring: This library provides an implementation of [Application Default Credentials (ADC)][application default credentials] for PHP.
symbols.name: Application Default Credentials

children.docstring: The `FileSystemCacheItemPool` class is a `PSR-6` compliant cache that stores its serialized objects on disk, caching data between processes and making
children.name: FileSystemCacheItemPool Cache

children.docstring: You can use a third party that follows the `PSR-6` interface of your choice.
children.name: Integrating with a third party cache

symbols.docstring: Caching is enabled by passing a PSR-6 `CacheItemPoolInterface` instance to the constructor when instantiating the credentials.
